name: Y.A.Z.S.G [LDJ51]
description:
Yet Another Zombie Survival Game (aka YAZSG) is a rogue-like survival shooter.

Fight hoardes of zombies, upgrade your character and survive.

You gain 1 free upgrade every 10 seconds, use it wisely.

 Features

* 2 Different Characters, Different Gameplay

* Cool Mechanics like Slow Motion and Time Manipulation

Tips

* Upgrade your Fire Rate and Reload Speed first, HP is not that important in early stages.

* There is no cooldown for your special ability, use it frequently.

Controls

* LEFT CLICK : SHOOT

* RIGHT CLICK : SPECIAL ABILITY

* R : RELOAD

Credits

* Anttis instrumentals
